summary: Website project includes a public photography portfolio with categorized works management and a Certificates section; user also requested photo upload via standard file picker (album/internal storage/drive) and a light-blue (#87ceeb) + black theme update.
known_issues: Deployed site did not reflect the requested light-blue/black theme change; palette remained on the previous theme.

existing_features.title: Create a basic multi-page website scaffold with a top navigation and footer, including at minimum: Home, About, and Contact pages, using English for all user-facing text.
Implement simple client-side routing for the website pages so navigation does not require full page reloads.
Add a lightweight Contact form UI (name, email, message) with basic client-side validation and a clear success/error state in the UI (no email sending integration required).
Define and apply a coherent, distinct visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) across all pages; avoid a blue/purple primary palette.
Add new public site sections for a photography portfolio and certificates, accessible to all visitors without requiring login.
Implement portfolio category management (create, edit, delete) and ensure each photography work belongs to a category.
Implement photography works management (add, edit, delete) including fields sufficient to display a public portfolio entry.
Add a Certificates section with a public list view and an authenticated management UI to add/edit/delete certificates.
Restrict all create/edit/delete operations for categories, works, and certificates to authenticated users while keeping all read operations public.

Update the global theme tokens used by the app to implement a light-blue (#87ceeb) and black palette, replacing the current warm/terracotta colors. Apply the change in the stylesheet that is actually imported by the app (frontend/src/index.css is imported by frontend/src/main.tsx).

Ensure dark mode also follows the light-blue (#87ceeb) and black direction by using a near-black background with #87ceeb accents and readable light foreground text, while preserving existing theme toggle behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Define and build the website (requirements, pages/features, design, and deployment details TBD).
Add portfolio categories and allow managing photography works with CRUD (add/edit/delete) within categories.
Add a Certificates tab/section to the website.
Ensure visitors can browse photography works without logging in (public access).
Add image upload using the standard file picker so users can select images from device album, internal storage, or connected drive providers.
Update the site visual theme to use light blue (#87ceeb) and black (confirm background/accent usage).

projectName: Initial website scaffold with basic pages and theme
